Over 250 Years of

Combined Experience

SOAProjects, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is a leading professional advisory firm. SOAProjects operates six world-class service lines that cover a broad range of professional services to support clients as they grow and navigate a shifting regulatory landscape.

With over 250 years of combined experience in accounting, auditing, compliance and IT Advisory, SOAProjects creates unique solutions to satisfy the needs of even its most demanding clients.

SOAProjects has served over 450 companies and has significant experience working in number of industries.
